content: Prompted by Dropbox's [announcement of webhooks](https://www.dropbox.com/developers/blog/90/announcing-dropbox-webhooks), yesterday, I resumed my semi-regular thoughts about powering this site using a combination of [Drafts](http://agiletortoise.com/drafts/) on iOS, Dropbox and Heroku, perhaps with tweets via Tweetbot using a callback chain. Might have a hack on that sometime.
